code: import axios from'axios';import config from'../config/environment';const staffClient=axios.create({baseURL:config.backendUrl,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});staffClient.interceptors.request.use(request=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('authToken');if(token){request.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return request;});export const staffAPI={getAll:()=>staffClient.get('/api/staff'),getByDepartment:department=>staffClient.get("/api/staff/department/".concat(department)),getById:id=>staffClient.get("/api/staff/".concat(id)),create:data=>staffClient.post('/api/staff',data),update:(id,data)=>staffClient.put("/api/staff/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>staffClient.delete("/api/staff/".concat(id))};
